alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 11:37PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A HEAVY SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT BEAVER...SOUTHERN LAWRENCE... BUTLER...JEFFERSON...CENTRAL ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND SOUTHEASTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 1135 PM EST, a havey snow band was located along a line extending from near Portland Mills to near Ellwood City. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. Locations impacted include... Cranberry, New Castle, Butler, Aliquippa, Beaver Falls, Monaca, Clarion, Kittanning, Brookville, Rimersburg, Economy, and Ellwood City. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 29. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 79 and 106. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 50 and 96. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 16 and 42. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Jefferson; Lawrence
